Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I know that @RoverDude added some hooks into the game for inflatable modules, but there wasn't much on what those hooks specifically were. One I just found is Part.habitableVolume, and I know you can call Part.SpawnIVA() and Part.DespawnIVA(). I'm wondering if there are other hooks. Specifically, is there a way to tell the editor to get rid of available crew slots?
